channel.title: [508] Removing PvP Drops[508]
channel.description:
Ok I am using MithScape, and its a Palidino 76. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,367385.0.html anyways, it has a random PvP drop thing, where if u kill some1 with full bandos for example you won't get the bandos you get a random item(s). How can I get rid of the random pvp drop function, where if i kill some1 with full bandos i get the bandos and anything else they had basically.
Help is very appreciated =)
